subject: Automobile Racing
Appointments and Executive Changes
lead_paragraph: In a surprise move in April, Marco Mattiacci, 43, joined the Ferrari team as sporting director. But by the end of this season the team announced that Mr. Mattiaci would have to leave.
snippet: In a surprise move in April, Marco Mattiacci, 43, joined the Ferrari team as sporting director. But by the end of this season the team announced that Mr. Mattiaci would have to leave.
